data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh, how long did I sleep? I seem to have had a really long dream.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Looks like the class is over, all the students left. I feel ashamed for being sleep during the whole class on my first day...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I think I get to study harder at home to catch up on.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I am starving right now, I remember there's a Chinese restaurant upstairs, I want to try the Dandan noodles this time:)
